
XwaWorkspaceViewer runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11, or superior)

XwaWorkspaceEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11, or superior)

XwaShpInstaller runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11, or superior)
